about.title: About Me
about.content1: I lead the BI team and market research division at Grupo Bafar, implementing predictive analytics for strategic planning.
about.content2: Master's in Data Science and Business Intelligence (Dual Degree) from UPAEP Mexico & Universidad Siglo XXI Argentina. My thesis on Local Climate Zone classification using Gradient Boosting Forest achieved 84% accuracy, surpassing international standards through remote sensing and ML integration.
about.content3: Specialized in agentic AI, automation workflows, and predictive market research. I've achieved 2300% efficiency improvements in catalog processing and 30% reduction in processing times through n8n automation and API pipeline optimization.
about.preview: Specialist in transforming data into strategic decisions, combining deep technical expertise with business vision to drive organizational innovation.

impact.title: Measurable Business Impact
impact.description: Leadership of initiatives that generated 15% increase in market opportunities, 2300% improvement in processing efficiency, and 70% automation of manual analyses through agentic AI systems and intelligent workflows.

research.title: Applied Research Profile
research.description: Multidisciplinary research in urban climatology, applied machine learning, satellite remote sensing, and strategic business intelligence, focused on solving real-world problems in business and urban sectors.

leadership.title: Multisector Leadership
leadership.description: Experience managing technical teams across food, retail, and government sectors, implementing digital transformation and democratizing access to data-driven insights for C-suite strategic decision-making.

project1.title: Mexico City LCZ Classification

project4.description: Per capita consumption models and state-by-state projections for Mexico

project6.description: Geospatial dashboard to identify high-potential commercial zones and optimize distribution routes
project6.achievement: 20% operational cost reduction and 35% market coverage increase

job1.title: Head of Intelligence Center
job1.description: Leading the Intelligence Center with multidisciplinary BI and market research teams. Responsible for data strategy across all group divisions (Food, Retail, Food Service, International). Implementation of agentic AI systems that reduced manual analysis by 70% and generated new market opportunities.

job2.title: Senior Data Analyst
job2.description: Led process optimization initiatives that increased operational efficiency by 18%. Development of executive dashboards for decision-making and data pipeline architecture that reduced processing times by 2300%.

job3.title: Data Analyst
job3.description: Resource allocation optimization in civilian support operations with multi-million dollar budgets. Cross-functional coordination with suppliers, logistics, and finance. Development of analysis models that improved aid distribution efficiency.

job4.title: Electoral Intelligence Analyst
job4.description: Development of data-driven acquisition strategies for federal electoral campaigns. Analysis of engagement KPIs, audience segmentation, and digital media investment optimization.
